name: Spent Node
description:
A GAME ABOUT A PLANT THAT JUST WON'T GROW

You have acquired a plant cutting. It refuses to grow. Will this turn out to be another one of your failed projects, or can you save it?

Listen to the perspectives of those around you, or don't. Examine your thoughts, or don't. Make friendships, break them, or don't.  Figure out where your life is going, or don't.  It's up to you, and maybe a little up to this plant too.

--------------------------------

Spent Node is a visual novel made in Ren'Py for NaNoRenO 2022 by a solo dev! It is now complete.

Features:

  • 18000~ words
  • 4 endings with variations for your different choices
  • Name your main character and choose your pronouns


Credits

Additional credits are in the game!

  • Sirtet code: Adapted from this one by sDextra
  • Phone interface: Adapted from this one by nadia nova
  • Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)
